sys_hub_action_type_definition.annotation: 0 : pending, 16 : running, 32 : shutting-down, 48 : terminated, 64 : stopping, 80 : stopped
sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: This action assumes that the credential alias has been correctly set in a different configuration step
